name: BEBO the BOOM BOX
description:
Meet BEBO the BOOM BOX. All BEBO wants to do is make beats & move the crowd! But... WHY ARE THERE MONSTERS?? &  WHERE ARE WE EVEN????? 

This beta is just a crumb of what's already been made for BEBO. There's a whole world waiting to be explored filled with monsters & mysteries. If you want to see more sooner, please consider donating (coming soon)! In the mean time, have fun making some tunes! Practice up! Not all the monsters you meet will be so friendly...

D-Pad for movement

'A' through 'K' plays musical notes

'Z' & 'X' scroll through your 4 instruments

'C' & 'V' scroll through musical moods

Space Bar starts & ends a loop 

Backspace deletes the current loop

Shift takes you to your instrument select screen

'A' is affirmative & 'S' is back on the instrument screen

*DISCLAIMER* this beta is SUPER rough. It does crash on occasion & things are generally wonky. This game holds a special place in my heart and will grow but I'm busy enough that progress and bug fixes will be slow for now.

*KNOWN BUGS* bad slow down can build as the game runs. refresh your browser when you've had enough and want to start fresh. This will be the first bug squashed.
